title: Design for Citibank/Citicorp Logo
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
medium: Brush and black ink, black marker, brush and white gouache on white tracing paper
description: Design consists of a black circle centered on a sheet containing four three-dimensionally drawn boxes, positioned in a clockwise motion.  The negative area at center of the boxes creates a black four pointed, vertically oriented star.  The black lines of the front sides of the boxes are strongly delineated.  The secondary lines, or the back side of the boxes, have been overdrawn with gouache to suggest a three-dimensional illusion.
name: Drawing
